question: ‘Business Confidence Index’, which was making news recently, is released by which institution?
explanation:
The Business Confidence Index (BCI) is developed by the Delhi-based economic think tank National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER).
As per the recent edition, the index increased 29.6 per cent between second and third quarter of the current financial year. The survey findings are based on the responses from 500 companies.
